episode_event_valentine_2023/4001_1001_0:
Delivering happiness to you! This is Mistralton
Cargo Service!

I’m so glad I asked you to be the chief advertiser
for Mistralton Cargo Service, Elesa!
Our popularity is gonna rocket up for sure!
I’m glad that I could help you, too.

I also wanted to thank you for the Egg you
gave me.

I raised it, and it grew to be a healthy and
wonderful partner Pokémon.
Oh yeah. I just had an idea.

It’s almost Palentine’s Day, right? How about we
do a campaign to go with it?
episode_event_valentine_2023/4001_1001_1:
We could deliver sweets to everyone under the
Mistralton Cargo Service name.
But what should we do for the actual sweets?

I’d like something that will get everyone on
Pasio talking...

Got it! Then let’s find someone who can make
sweets like that!
episode_event_valentine_2023/6801_1031_0:
Delivering the mightiest
apple pies to everyone!
episode_event_valentine_2023/6801_1001_0: Let’s deliver happiness on Pasio, Mallow!

I’m gonna put a smile on everyone’s face with the
mightiest apple pie!

Okeydokey, let’s make ’em smile and
float! *chuckle*
episode_event_valentine_2023/4002_1001_0: Here it is! Mallow’s Special Apple Pie No. 7!
Hm? I’m actually kinda full right now...
OK... Let’s eat it at the same time.
Er... It has a bitter aftertaste...
What did you put in it?
episode_event_valentine_2023/4002_1001_1: Wow, it’s apple pie! Did you make these, Mallow?
I’m actually trying to make the mightiest apple pie.

Hey, Mallow. There’s something we’ve been
looking for...

I see! So you want some sweets for
Palentine’s Day!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4002_1001_2: I want everyone to try my mightiest apple pie!

But you said the pie isn’t perfected yet, right?
Can you make it in time, Mallow?

Don’t worry! I’m definitely gonna perfect it by
Palentine’s Day!
I’m also interested in this “mightiest apple pie.”

I’m the owner of a popular dessert shop here
on Pasio!

I’m afraid you won’t be needed here as long as
I’m around, Mallow.
episode_event_valentine_2023/4002_1001_3:
Because the perfect dessert for Elesa’s
campaign is...
the pride of our shop—the ULTIMATE apple pie!

On top of that, I’m a huge Elesa fan! I’m
absolutely devoted to her, so my feelings
just can’t be beat!

You should withdraw. I’m telling you this for your
own good.
B-but I want everyone to try my apple pie, too!
Two candidates... What should we do?

We’ll have to eat and compare the two apple pies
to see which is better.
That means we need a cooking competition!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4002_1001_4:
Heh, sure. It’s pointless, though, since the winner
will obviously be me.
Oh, but what’ll happen if our votes are split?

It might be a problem if we don’t have
another judge...
Could I take on that role?
episode_event_valentine_2023/4003_1001_0: Could I take on that role?
Oh, Victor! Are you up to the usual?
Yup. I was camping nearby with some Pokémon.
Oh, do you know each other?

I raised my Appletun from an Applin that Victor
gave me!

I’ve heard the rumors about Applin in Galar
from Nessa.
Victor, does that mean Mallow is...
episode_event_valentine_2023/4003_1001_1: Ohh! Haha! I didn’t mean it like that!

I gave it to her because I thought Mallow would
take good care of Applin.
Oh, don’t worry about it. It was a failed setup.

I may not look it, but I like cooking, and I’m
confident in my sense of taste!

Yeah! The quality of the ingredients were shining
in the curry he made at camp!
I see... Are you OK with this, Skyla?
episode_event_valentine_2023/4003_1001_2:
I won’t play favorites, of course! I’m gonna
judge fairly.

Show me the harmony between Mallow and
Appletun, the grown-up Applin!

All right! I’m definitely gonna perfect the mightiest
apple pie!

Heh. I suggested you withdraw to save yourself
some embarrassment, but...
Mallow’s full of energy... Is she gonna be OK?
episode_event_valentine_2023/4004_1001_0:
We came here to get a taste of our
competition, but...

He wasn’t lying when he said he was popular
on Pasio.
Did you all come to have some apple pie, Mallow?

We’re scoping out the competition! Have you two
already tried it?

The pie crust was crispy on the outside and
perfectly moist.

The chunky bits of apple and the rich custard
cream melded together to balance out
the sweetness.
episode_event_valentine_2023/4004_1001_1:
I think all of the high-quality ingredients used in
this pie were used to bring out its full potential,
and that made it so tasty!
Everything in our shop is of the highest quality!

Just using expensive ingredients doesn’t make
it good!

I told you, everything we have is the highest
quality! Your chances of beating us are zero, kid.
And let me tell you why!
We have Siebold, the legendary chef, on our side!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4005_1101_0:
Mallow and her friends kept working on improving
her apple pie...
episode_event_valentine_2023/4005_1001_0: Compared to the ultimate apple pie, it’s still...

Hmm... How am I gonna win against
Siebold’s cooking?

I was interested in the “ultimate taste” the
owner aspires to achieve.

I became the chef at this shop to challenge my
own limits and to complete this piece of art.

I didn’t know the legendary chef from Kalos was
helping them out...
episode_event_valentine_2023/4005_1001_1:
I wonder if I should do what he says
and withdraw...

So what if the opponent is a legendary chef?
You’re gonna let that convince you to give up?

No matter how hungry we are, you’ll chase us
down to try your food.
Where’s that energetic Mallow we know?

That’s right, Mallow! I respect your passion as
a chef!

That’s why I entrusted you and your family with
my Magmar!

I’m sure your passion, when set aflame, will help
you surpass Siebold!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4005_1001_2:
Your cooking is special, Mallow. And that’s
something only you are able to draw out!

It doesn’t matter who I’m up against! I’m gonna
keep cooking my own special recipes!
Lana, Kiawe! Give me a hand!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4006_1001_0:
I was worried and came to see if Mallow was
able to perfect her pie...but I think she’ll be OK.

Hehe! I’m excited to see what kind of apple pie
she makes.
episode_event_valentine_2023/4007_1101_0: On the day of the competition...

Mallow and her friends took her final apple pie to
the competition.
episode_event_valentine_2023/4007_1001_0:
I didn’t expect to have to compete with you
like this.
As a chef, I won’t go easy on you!

But Siebold, going against an amateur without
any handicap is a bit...

Therefore, you can choose to go first or
second, Mallow.

Going first would be advantageous because
hunger is the best sauce, but...
episode_event_valentine_2023/4007_1001_1:
The deliciousness of the mightiest apple pie won’t
be influenced by that!

Hello, judges! This is the ultimate apple pie,
perfected with the help of Siebold!
I-it’s so yummy! I’ve never had anything like it!
This is dangerously tasty! I can’t stop!
This is Chef Siebold’s ultimate apple pie!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4008_1101_0: The judges took a bite of Mallow’s apple pie...
episode_event_valentine_2023/4008_1001_0: Interesting! It has a refreshingly tart kick to it!

What? Is it possible to taste something
so differently?
Half of it is sour, and the other half is sweet!

You must’ve used both sweet apples and tart
apples... Am I right?

Yep! The idea came to me when I looked
at Appletun!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4008_1001_1:
Appletun looks like it does now because it ate a
Sweet Apple.

But I heard it would evolve into something else if
it ate a Tart Apple!

Everyone has their own preferences, so what we
think is tasty can differ from person to person!

So I thought I should just make an apple pie that
more people can enjoy!

Hmph! You knew you’d lose, so you tried some
outlandish idea.
When it comes to food, people like different things.

It doesn’t make much sense to decide that one dish
is better than the other.
episode_event_valentine_2023/4008_1001_2: The mightiest apple pie, made by Mallow!

Your idea to incorporate both sweet and tart
flavors was brilliant!

You even looked up a lot of information on Applin,
too! Thank you!

I think everyone will have so much fun deciding
whether Mallow’s apple pie is sweet or tart!

It’s perfect for our goal to make our treat
something that all of Pasio will talk about!
Yeah, that was impressive! I’m moved!
episode_event_valentine_2023/4008_1001_3:
I have the best chef and the best ingredients!
There’s no way I could lose!

I won’t accept this result! This competition
was rigged!

We labor tirelessly to make something wonderful
that will disappear from sight as soon as it is
enjoyed. That is the life of a chef!

We were too distracted by the quality of the
cooking and didn’t consider the hearts of the
people who would taste it!

Why can you not accept that as the reason we
were one step behind?
May I try that apple pie, Mallow?
episode_event_valentine_2023/4008_1001_4:
This is certainly a piece of art that I
cannot replicate.

Thank you for reminding me that the road of
cooking has no end, Mallow.
It was an honor to battle with you, Siebold!
I’ll keep on trying to master the road of cooking!
Let’s both keep aiming for the top, as chefs.
episode_event_valentine_2023/4009_1001_0: Your apple pie is so popular, Mallow!
Thank you so much, Elesa, Mallow!

Because of you two, Mistralton Cargo Service’s
popularity has shot up!
So sweet! But this side is sour!

If you eat it together, it’s perfect! What an
incredible apple pie!
There’s still loads more, so eat it all up, everyone!
